doc.after: The LaRouche criminal trials in the mid 1980s stemmed from federal and state investigations into the activities of American political activist Lyndon LaRouche and members of his movement They were charged with conspiring to commit fraud and soliciting loans they had no intention of repaying LaRouche and his supporters disputed the charges claiming the trials were politically motivated
